title: Textile, "Stainless Steel Longitude", 2006
medium:
Medium: stainless steel, cotton, viscose
Technique: hand-woven plain weave
dimensions: Overall: 323 x 78 cm (10 ft. 7 3/16 in. x 30 11/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of June Swindell, Salt UK Ltd.
description: Vertical stripes of shiny white and gold viscose fibers held in a stainless steel mesh, alternating bands of warp conventionally bound with bands where the warp is permitted to drift.
